title: SEVERE STORMS AND FLOODING ASSOCIATED WITH HURRICANE GUSTAV
summary: 2008년 Arkansas에서 발생한 Hurricane 재난. FEMA 재난 번호: 1793. 재난 선언일: 2008-09-18.
description:
## 개요

SEVERE STORMS AND FLOODING ASSOCIATED WITH HURRICANE GUSTAV

**재난 종료일**: 2008-09-08
